bibdata.title: IEEE Recommended Practice for Cement Plant Power Distribution
IEEE Recommended Practice for Cement Plant Power Distribution

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Electrical distribution systems in cement plants that would result in satisfactory equipment utilization, reliability, performance, safety, and low maintenance&#x2013;all at a reasonable cost&#x2013;are recommended.

This document has been developed as a recommended practice for electrical distribution systems in cement plants with the objective of satisfactory equipment utilization, reliability, performance, safety, and low maintenance&#8212;all at a reasonable cost. Revision of IEEE Std 277-1994

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
